tsn: 11 feb 2010motlotlegi mmusakgotla.
xho: 11 feb 2010somlomo ohloniphekileyo.

tsn: modulasetilo wa lekgotla la bosetshaba la diporofense.
xho: sihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo.

tsn: motlatsammusakgotla wa kokoanobosetshaba gammogo le motlatsamodulasetilo wa lekgotla la bosetshaba la diporofense.
xho: sekela somlomo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe kunye nosekela sihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo.

tsn: motlatsamoporesidente wa rephaboliki, motlotlegi kgalema motlanthe.
xho: sekela mongameli weriphabliki, ohloniphekileyo ukgalema motlanthe.

tsn: motlotlegi moatlhodimogolo wa rephaboliki ya aforika borwa le ditokololo tse di tlotlegang tsa boatlhodi.
xho: kwehloniphekileyo ijaji eyintloko yeriphabliki yomzantsi afrika, nakuwo onke amalungu axabisekileyo ecandelo leenkundla.

tsn: isithwalandwe, moporesidente nelson rolihlahla mandela.
xho: isithwalandwe umongameli unelson rolihlahla mandela.

tsn: moporesidente wa maloba fw de klerk.
xho: owayesakuba ngumongameli u-fw de klerk.

tsn: rraarona, moporesidente wa maloba wa zambia, kenneth kaunda.
xho: ubawo wethu, owayesakuba ngumongameli wasezambia ukenneth kaunda.

tsn: batlatsamoporesidente ba maloba.
xho: kwababesakuba ngoosekela mongameli.

tsn: ditonakgolo tse di tlotlegang gammogo le babusakgotla ba diporofense tsa rona.
xho: iinkulumbuso ezibekekileyo kunye noosomlomo bamaphondo wethu.

tsn: modulasetilo wa salga mmogo boeteledipele jotlhe jwa pusoselegaemosulasetilo wa ntlo ya bosetshaba ya dikgos.
xho: usihlalo webhunga loomasipala basemzantsi afrika kunye nazo zonke iinkokheli zoorhulumente basekhaya.

tsn: iditlhogo tsa ditheo tsa puso tse di tshegetsang temokerasi ya molaotheo.
xho: usihlalo wendlu yeenkokheli zemveli yesizwe.

tsn: mmusisi wa banka ya resefe.
xho: kwiintloko zamaziko karhulumente axhasa intando yesininzi.

tsn: baeng ba boditshabatshaba ba ba kgethegileng, bogolosegolo modulasetilo wa khomisene ya kopano ya aforika, rre jean ping.
xho: kwirhuluneli yebhanka enguvimba.

tsn: bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba maloba, mmogo le bagaka.
xho: ababesakuba ngamabanjwa opolitiko neenkonde.

tsn: ditokololo tsa mephato ya sedipolomatiki.
xho: kumalungu eenkonzo zozakuzo.

tsn: bobegakgang jwa aforika borwa le ba batswantle.
xho: koonondaba basemzantsi afrika nabamazwe angaphandle.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika.

tsn: dumelang, molweni, goeienaand, good evening, dumelang botlhe ka fa lapeng!
xho: dumelang, molweni, goeie naand, good evening, sanibonani nonke emakhaya!

tsn: re itumelela go nna le lona mo maitseboeng ano a a botlhokwa go gaisa.
xho: siyavuya ukuba nani ngobubusuku bubaluleke kangaka.

tsn: motlotlegi mmusakgotla,ke ema fano fa pele ga lona maitseboeng ano dingwaga di le 20 go tloga motsi moporesidente nelson rolihlahla mandela a golotsweng mo kgolegelong.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo,ndimi phambi kwakho ngobu busuku, sekuyiminyaka ingama-20 ukususela mhla umongameli nelson rolihlahla mandela waphumayo eluvalelweni.

tsn: re tlhophile letsatsi leno go epa pitso ya bonno jwa motlhakanelwa jwa palamente, go neela puo ya maemo a setshaba, gore re keteke motsi wa phetogo ya diragadibonwe e e fetotseng naga ya rona.
xho: sikhethe olu suku njengosuku lokubiza lendibanisela yezindlu zepalamente ukuze ndinikezele ngentetho kamongameli engobume besizwe, ukubhiyozela imbali eyaguqula ilizwe lethu.

tsn: go gololwa ga mandela go tlhodilwe ke kgaratlho ya go itoma sesino ya baagi ba aforika borwa.
xho: ukukhululwa kukamadiba kwabangelwa yimizabalazo engahexiyo yabantu basemzantsi afrika.

tsn: bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba maloba mmogo le bagaka ba ba nang le rona gajaana, ke basupi ba ntlha e ka gobo ba nnile karolo ya tiragalo eo.
xho: ababesakuba ngamabanjwa opolitiko neenkonde ezikunye nathi apha bayibona loo nto kuba nabo babeyinxalenye yaloo nkqubo.

tsn: lo tla gakologelwa gore matshutitshuti a naga e, a le mo digongwaneng tse di farologaneng, a ne a tsibogela kgwetlho ya go tlhola botlhokataolego jwa naga mmogo le go fedisiwa ga tlhaolele ka maikaelelo a magolo tota.
xho: ngokuqinisekileyo uya kukhumbula ukuba abantu beli lizwe ngokobuninzi babo, kwiindibanisela ezahluka hlukeneyo, balisabela ngokuzinikela ikhwelo lokwenza eli lizwe ukuba lingalawuleki nocalu-calulo lungasebenzi.

tsn: re keteka letsatsi le, re le mmogo le bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba maloba ba re ba laleditseng ka tsela e e kgethegileng.
xho: olu suku silubhiyozela sikunye nabo babesakuba ngamabanjwa opolitiko nesithe sabamema ngokukodwa ukuba babe kunye nathi.

tsn: re amogela bogolosegolo bagolegwa ba ba maloba ba ba tsereng mosepele go tswa moseja ga mawatle gore ba tle go nna fano helene pastoors, michael dingake go tswa botswana, rre andimba toivo ya toivo wa swapo kwa namibia.
xho: sibamkela ngokukodwa abo basuka kumazwe angaphesheya ukuze babe kunye nathi, uhelene pastoors, umichael dingake basebotswana, umnu andimba toivo ya toivo weswapo enamibia.

tsn: re motlotlo gobo re na le ditokololo tsa setlhopha sa babueledi ba tsheko ya boepapuso ya rivonia ?
xho: sinovuyo ukuba iqela lezomthetho kwityala lokungcatsha umbuso laserivonia libe likunye nathi ?

tsn: lord joel joffe yo gajaana a nnang kwa london, mmogo le moatlhodi arthur chaskalson.
xho: ulord joffe, ongumhlali waselondon sithethe nje kunye nojaji arthur chaskalson.

tsn: re boa re gakologelwa le go akgola rre harry schwarz, yo ka maswabi a hulereng mo bekeng e e fetileng.
xho: sikwakhumbula simnika nembeko umnu harry schwarz, nothe ngelishwa wasweleka kule veki iphelileyo.

tsn: gareng ga tse dingwe, rre schwarz o nnile tokololo ya setlhopha sa babueledi ba rivonia.
xho: phakathi kwezinye izinto, ebelilungu leqela elimele abamangalelwa kwityala laserivonia.

tsn: re isa ditebogo go ditsala le bakaulengwe mo morafeng wa boditshabatshaba, gobo ba lole ba bapile le rona gore re fitlhelele kgololesego.
xho: sidlulisa umbulelo wethu kubahlobo bethu namaqabane wamazwe ngamazwe, ngokuthi bancedisane nathi ngamaxesha onke xa besilwela ukuzuza inkululeko yethu.

tsn: re isa kamogelo e e kgethegileng go balelapa loo mandela.
xho: samkela ngokukodwa usapho lakwamandela.

tsn: balelapa loo mandela ba nnile sekai sa boineelo jwa bontsi, jo bo duleng setlhabelo sa kgobelelo ya tlhaolele.
xho: bathe baba luphawu lokuzenza idini kwabaninzi abathi babulaleka phantsi kwengqumbo yocalucalulo.

tsn: re isa madume go boeteledipele jwa lekoko le le busang mmogo le balekanesemphato.
xho: sibulisa iinkokheli zeqela elilawulayo kunye nembumba yamahlakani yalo, ekungumsitho owodwa kubo lo.

tsn: mo go bona motsi o o o kgethegileng go menagana gabedi.
xho: bantu bakuthi nabahlobo,ngale mini ikhethekileyo, kufuneka siqaphele negalelo labo babe kubunkokheli be-nationa party, nabathe ekugqibeleni babona ukuthi ucalucalulo alunakamva.

tsn: bakaulengwe le ditsala,mo letsatsing leno le le kgethegileng, re tshwanetse go amogela go tsenya seatla ga boeteledipele jwa national party, jo kwa bofelong bo lemogileng gore tlhaolele ga e na bokamoso.
xho: ndivumeleni ndithethe ngendima eyadlalwa ngowayesakuba ngumongameli u-pw botha.

tsn: ntetleng go bolela seabe se moporesidente wa maloba pw botha a nnileng naso.
xho: yaba nguye owavula iingxoxo ezimalunga nokukhululwa kwamabanjwa opolitiko.

tsn: moporesidente botha o dirile mmogo le tona ya bosiamisi ya maloba, rre kobie coetzee yo ena a neng a thusiwa ke ngaka neil barnard le mike louw.
xho: umongameli ubotha ngokusebenzisana nowayesakuba ngumphathiswa wezobulungisa, umnu kobie coetzee, nothe yena wancediswa ngugqirha neil barnard nomnu mike louw.

tsn: ba nnile le seabe sa botlhokwa mo go betleng tsela ya kgololesego ya ga madiba.
xho: badlala indima ebalulekileyo kwinkqubo eyakhokelela ekukhululweni kukamadiba.

tsn: bakaulengwe ba ba tlotlegang,aforika borwa e sa ntse e tla amogela ka botlalo, seabe sa botlhokwatlhokwa se moporesidente wa anc wa maloba oliver tambo a nnileng le sone ka go aga motheo o naga eno e duleng sekao se se phatsimang sa kgololesego le temokerasi.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,umzantsi afrika kufanele kwakhona uqaphele ngokupheleleyo, indima ebalulekileyo eyadlalwa ngowayesakuba ngumongameli we-anc, uqabane oliver tambo, nowathi wakhela eli lizwe isisekelo sokuba ngumzekelo oqaqambileyo wenkululeko nentando yesininzi.

tsn: ke boeteledipele jwa gagwe jo bo tlhololo, ponelopele mmogo le pono e e edileng, tse di tataisitseng anc gore e nonotshe motlhala wa tumalano ka dipuisano.
xho: yaba bubunkokheli bakhe obuqaqambileyo, ukubona into isekude, nombono ocacileyo okwakhokelela ukuba i-anc iqinise ekutyhaleleni kwisivumelwano ekubonisweneyo ngaso.

tsn: botlhale jwa gagwe bo itshupile gape mo tlhomamisong ya harare, e a e kwadileng le go e tswerefatsa.
xho: ubulumko bakhe baphinda babonakaliswa kwisibhambathiso saseharare, awathi wasibhala wanguvulindlela waso kananjalo.

tsn: se ke sona se tlhomileng motheo wa dikitsiso tsa hisetori ka moporesidente fw de klerk, dingwaga di le 20 tse di hulereng.
xho: yaba koku okwathi kwakha isisekelo sesibhengezo esaba yimbali esenziwa ngumongameli u-fw de klerk, kwiminyaka engama-20 eyadlulayo.

tsn: ka dikitsiso tse, moporesidente de klerk o supile bopelokgale mmogo le boeteledipele jo bo edileng.
xho: koku, umongameli de klerk wabonakalisa ukuba nesibindi okukhulu nobunkokheli obungahexiyo.

tsn: mo letsatsing le legolo leno, nte ke amogele le seabe se se tserweng ke moswi mme helen suzman.
xho: ngale mini ibalulekileyo, mandiqaphele kwakhona indima eyadlalwa ngongasekhoyo unkosk.

tsn: mo pakeng e telele, helen suzman o nnile ntsweesi mo palamenteng,a goa phetogo.
xho: helen suzman.

tsn: re amogela le seabe sa moeteledipele wa inkatha freedom party, kgosi mangosuthu buthelezi, yo le ena a goileng kgololesego ya ga madiba mmogo le ya bagolegwa ba sepolotiki ba bangwe, a bo a goa le poelogae ya batshediswamelelwane.
xho: ixesha elide, waba lilizwi elinkenteza lodwa epalamente, elimemeza ngotshintsho.

tsn: re gatelela tebogo ya rona ya botswapelo go morafe wa boditshabatshaba malebana le tshegetso ya bona e e tlhomameng mo kgaratlhong ya rona.
xho: siphinda kwakhona umbulelo wethu osuka emazantsi entliziyo kwabezizwe ngezizwe ngenkxaso yabo engagungqiyo ekuxhaseni umzabalazo wethu.

tsn: metsotso e etsa eno mo hisetoring ya rona e supa bokgoni jwa rona jwa go tshwaragana, le mo maemong a a bokete go gaisa, ka maikaelelo a go eteletsa dikgatlhegelo tsa naga pele, go gaisa dikgatlhegelo tsotlhe tse dingwe.
xho: la mathuba kwimbali yethu abonakalisa amandla wethu okumanyana, nkqu nangaphezu kwazo naziphi na iimeko ezinzima, nokubeka phambili iimfuno zesizwe ngaphezu kwazo naziphi na ezinye iimfuno.

tsn: fa re dirisana re ka fitlhelela go le gontsintsi.
xho: xa sisebenzisana singenza ngcono.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,mo tsamaong ya ngwaga o, re tla tshwaya ngwaga wa ngwagakgolo wa tlhomo ya kitlano ya aforika borwa e e tlhomilweng ka 1910. se se tlhamile naga e e kopaneng.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,apha ekuhambeni konyaka, siza kubhiyozela ukusekwa kwemanyano yomzantsi afrika, neyasekwa ngowe-1910.

tsn: se se lemogiwang ke gore go tlhotlhololwa ga bantsho mo kopanong e, e nnile lebakalegolo la go tlhomiwa ga african national congress ka 1912. fa re tshwaya ngwagakgolo o, moragonyana monongwaga, re tshwanetse go leba gore naga ya rona e tsamaile sekgala se le kae go tloga ka 1912. maloko a a tlotlegang, re gakologelwa mafoko a ga madiba ka motsi wa go gololwa ga gagwe fa a ne are mme ke a nopola:?
xho: oku kwadala umbuso olawulwa liqela elinye kungekho qela liphikisayo.

tsn: mafoko a a re rotloetsa gore re se ka ra bo ra ikhutsa go fitlhela re fitlhelela ditlhologelelo tsa morafe o o gololesegileng mo lehumeng le kiletso.
xho: xa siphawula lo mbhiyozo apha ekuhambeni konyaka, kufanele sibonakalise ukuba sesihambe kangakanani na njengesizwe.

tsn: a re tebeleng tlhologelelo e madiba a e lwetseng botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe, tlhologelelo ya morafe wa demokerasi o o gololesegileng fao batho ba botlhe ba tshelang mmogo ka kagiso mme ba na le tshono e e lekanang.
xho: la mazwi ayasivuselela ukuba singaphumli side sibe siyiphumezile iminqweno nenkolelo yoluntu olukhululekileyo kwindlala nasekusweleni.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,re epile pitso ya bonno jwa motlhakanelwa ya maitseboa gore bontsi jwa batho mo nageng, badiri mmogo le bana ba sekolo, bo kgone go nna karolo ya motsi ono.
xho: kule minyaka ingamashumi amabini ukususela ekukhululweni kukamadiba, ilizwe lethu litshintshe ngokuncamisayo.

tsn: re kgatlhilwe ke matlhagatlhaga a baswa malebana le motsi o. bana ba le makgolopedi masomethataro thataro go tswa diporofenseng tsotlhe, ba tsere karolo mo dikganetsanong tsa ketelela maemo a setshaba, malebana le seabe sa baswa mo ntweng kgatlhanong le lehuma.
xho: umongameli mandela walimanyanisa eli lizwe phantsi kweenjongo zomzantsi afrika ongenacalucalulo ngokwesini, ngokobuhlanga, wentando yesininzi nohlumayo.

tsn: re akgola mofenyikakaretso, charlotte le fleur wa sekolosegolwane sa worcester, mmogo le batsaakarolo botlhe ka matsapa a bona.
xho: njengoko sibhiyozela ukukhululwa kukamadiba namhlanje, masiphinde sizibophelele ekwakheni ingomso eliqaqambileyo labo bonke abantu basemzantsi afrika, abamnyama nabamhlophe.

tsn: bakaulengwe le ditsala,re kopane fano mo lemoragong la maemo a tlalelo ya ikonomi ya lefatshe.
xho: masiqhubele phambili umnqweno nenkolelo umadiba ebehlala eyilwela ubomi bakhe bonke ?

tsn: mo ngwageng o o fetileng, re itemogetse kwelotlase ya ntlha mo dingwageng di le 17. kwelotlase e, e jetse ikonomi ya rona ditiro di ka nna 900 000. bontsi jo bo latlhegetsweng ke ditiro e nnile batlamelalapa mo malapeng a bahumanegi.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,sibize le ndibanisela ebusuku ukuze uninzi lwabantu kwilizwe lethu, abasebenzi nabantwana besikolo, bakwazi ukuba yinxalenye yalo msitho.

tsn: ka tlhakole ngogola baemedi ba puso, bagwebi, badiri mmogo le baagi ba dumalane ka dikgato tsa go fokotsa kelo le maatla a tlalelo.
xho: siyithandile indlela ulutsha olubonakalise ngayo umdla ngokumalunga nalo msitho.

tsn: re diragaditse tirisomadi ya puso e e kgatlhanong le kwelotlase, bogolosegolo mo dipopotheong.
xho: ngamakhulu mabini anamashumi mathandathu anesithandathu abantwana abavela kuwo onke amaphondo abathe bathatha inxaxheba kwingxoxo-mpikiswano yangaphambi-kwentetho engobume besizwe malunga nendima yolutsha kumlo wokulwa nendlala.

tsn: go bebofaletsa bokobodikhutshwane, re atolositse madi a tlamelo ya bana go akaretsa bana ba ba fetang dingwaga di le 14. mo dingwageng di le tharo tse di latelang, palo e e okeditsweng ka dimilione di le pedi ya bana go tswa malapeng a batlhoki bana ba dingwaga di le 15 go ya go 18 e tla ungwa go tswa go maditlamelo a bana.
xho: siyavuyisana nophumelele phambili kubo bonke, ucharlotte le fleur wesikolo sesekondari saseworcester, nabo bonke abathathi-nxaxheba ngomsebenzi wabo omkhulu.

tsn: setlamo sa tlhabololo ya madirelo se beetse kwa thoko r6 bilione go thusa ditlamo tse di khidiegileng.
xho: bantu bakuthi nabahlobo,sidibana sizoku lwisana nentlekele yokubuyela umva koqoqosho lwehlabathi.

tsn: setshaba se tla gakologelwa gore ka nako ya puo ya maemo a setshaba ya 2009, ke itsisitse gore lenaneo le le atolositsweng la ditiro tsa setshaba le tla tlhola tshono ya ditiro di le 500 000 pele sedimonthole wa 2009 a khutla.
xho: ukuqiniseka ukuba ababetheki kakhulu, senyuse inkxaso-mali yezentlalo, saza sayandisa iminyaka yabantwana abafumana inkxaso-mali yabantwana yayakutsho kwiminyaka engaphezulu kwe-14.

tsn: tseno ke ditshono tsa ditiro tse di tlholwang go neela batho ba ba sa direng, lotseno, maitemogelo a tiro mmogo le tshono ya go katisiwa.
xho: kule minyaka mithathu izayo, abantwana abongezelelweyo abazizigidi ezibini abavela kwiintsapho nemizi ehlwempuzekileyo, ababudala buli-15 ukuya kwi-18 leminyaka, bayakuxhamla kwinkxaso-mali yabantwana.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang, maaforika borwa a gaetsho,re motlotlo go itsise gore fa sedimonthole a khutla, ke fa re tlhodile ditshono tsa ditiro tsa setshaba di le 480 000, e bong 97% ya ntlhatebo e re neng re e totile.
xho: iqumrhu lophuhliso lwamashishini ibekele bucala imali ezibhiliyoni ezi-6 ukuncedana neenkampani ezisokolayo.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,ditshupo tsa ikonomi di tlhagisa gore gajaana re a retologa.
xho: la malinge omelezwe yinkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu yethu.

tsn: dipalopalo tsa bodiri tse di golotsweng ka labobedi di supa gore ikonomi gajaana e tlhola ditiro go gaisa go di fedisa.
xho: isizwe siyakukhumbula ukuba kwintetho kamongameli engobume besizwe yowama-2009, ndabhengeza ukuba inkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu enatyisiweyo iza kudala amathuba emisebenzi engama-500 000 kweyomnga 2009. la ngamathuba emisebenzi adalelwe ukubonelela abantu abangaphangeliyo ngomvuzo, amava omsebenzi namathuba oqeqesho.

tsn: gajaana ke nako ya go ala motheo wa kgolo e e tiileng fa re ya pele, kgolo e e tlhamang ditiro tse dingwe.
xho: sityumbe imimandla ethile efuna ukuphuculwa, esiza kuyisebenzisa ukuya phambili, kuquka nokuqinisekisa ngeeprojekti ezijolise kakhulu ekusekweni kwemisebenzi.

tsn: mananeo a rona a thuto le bokgoni a tla oketsa kumo le bogaisani.
xho: siyawubulela umoya weentsapho, wobuhlali nomsebenzi wamavolontiya ovuselela abantu abaninizi ukuba bancede abo bachatshazelwe kakhulu yile ntlekele, ngala maxesha obunzima.

tsn: leanotiro la pholisi ya bodiredi mmogo le tebontshwa ya ditiro tse diswa, di tla aga madirelo a a maatla le a a ngokang badiri.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,iimpawu zoqoqosho zibonisa ukuba ngoku sesidlulile kwelona xesha linzima.

tsn: mananeo a rona a tlhabololo ya magae a tla tokafatsa kumo ya selegae mmogo le matshelo a batho ba ba tshelang mo mafelong a magae.
xho: uqoqosho luyakhula emzantsi afrika, kwaye silindele ukukhula koqoqosho okuya phambili.

tsn: motheo wa mananeo a rona a tsosoloso le kgodiso ya ikonomi ke mananeo a peeletso ya madi.
xho: iinkcukacha-manani zezemisebenzi ezikhutshwe ngolwesibini, zibonakalisa ukuba uqoqosho ludala amathuba emisebenzi kunokuba luyivale.

tsn: re tla netefatsa gore mafaratlhatlha a rona a diporo a a ikanyega, a kgona go gaisana, e bile a nyalana le go golagana botoka le boemelakepe.
xho: ngoku lixesha lokuba sakhe isiseko sokukhula koqoqosho olomeleleyo ukuya phambili, nokukhula okuvelisa amathuba emisebenzi eyongezelelweyo.

tsn: go netefatsa kabo ya maatlamotlakase e e ikanyegang, re tlhomile komiti ya ditona ya maatlamotlakase, go re kgontsha go tlhama thulaganokgolagano ya dingwaga di le 20. gareng ga tse dingwe, thulagano e, e ya go leba botsayakarolo jwa batsweletsi ba maatlamotlakase ba ba ikemetseng ka bosi, mmogo le go sireletsa batlhoki kgatlhanong le tlhotlhwa ya motlakase e e tlhatlogang.
xho: inkqubo yethu yeziseko zoncedo yexesha elide iza kusinceda sikhule ngoku khawuleza.

tsn: re ya go tlhoma botsamaisi jo bo ikemetseng, jo bo sa golaganang le eskom holdings.
xho: iinkqubo zethu zezemfundo nezakhono ziza kwandisa ukuvelisa kwethu nokukhuphisana.

tsn: eskom e tla tswelela go aga mothamo o o okeditsweng wa maatla, le go tokafatsa tlamelo ya diteisene tsa yona tsa maatlamotlakase.
xho: isicwangciso sokusebenza komgaqo-nkqubo wezoshishino wethu nengqwalasela yethu entsha kwimisebenzi efanelekileyo ngokusingqongileyo, siyakwakha ushishino olomelele ngokuthe chatha noluqesha abantu abaninzi.

tsn: re tlhamile lekgotlakgakololo la matlafatso e e atolositsweng ya ikonomi ya go tlhomamisa thotloetso ya ikonomi e e akaretsang botlhe.
xho: inkqubo yethu yophuhliso lwamaphandle iya kuphucula imveliso yasemaphandleni, kwakunye nobomi babantu abahlala emaphandleni.

tsn: tebo e e tshwanetseng go potlakelwa ya phetogo ya pholesi e tshwanetse go nna botsereganyi ka maikaelelo a go tlhola ditiro tsa baswa.
xho: isiseko sesicwangciso-qhinga sethu sokubuyisela uqoqosho nokukhula, inkqubo yethu yotyalo-mali lwemali eyinkunzi.

tsn: katoloso e nngwe ya mananeo a go thapiwa ga setshaba e mo tseleng.
xho: kwezothutho, siza kulolonga sandise uthungelwano lwethu leendlela.

tsn: se se akaretsa madirelo a selegae, diporojeke tsa maano a boraro, diporojeke tsa puisokwalo, tlhokomelo ya fa gae, tlhokomelo ya dikolo le kgodiso kgolo ya bana go tswa kwa bonnyeng.
xho: siza kuqinisekisa ukuba uthungelwano lwethu lomzila kaloliwe luthembakele, luyakhuphisana kwaye ludityaniswe ngendlela engcono namazibuko wethu.

tsn: mo ngwageng o o fetileng re kgakotse mokgatlho wa bosetshaba wa tlhabololo ya baswa.
xho: ukuqinisekisa unikezelo mbane oluthembakeleyo, siye saseka ikomiti yabaphathiswa kwezamandla, ukuze baphuhlise isicwangciso semithombo esidibeneyo seminyaka engama-20.

tsn: re kaetse setheo se go potlakisa tlhamo ya makala a sona naga ka bophara gore se kgone go re thusa go tsenya mananeo a tlhabololo ya baswa o moseleng o o maleba mo pusong.
xho: phakathi kwezinye izinto, oku kuya kujonga ekuthatheni inxaxheba kwabavelisi bombane abazimeleyo, nokukhusela abantu abahluphekileyo kumaxabiso ombane onyukayo.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,fa botsamaiso joo bo tsena tirong ngogola, re itlamile go dira ka natla gore re age naga e e nonofileng ya tlhabololo.
xho: siza kuseka ulawulo lwenkqubo ezimeleyo, eyahlukileyo ku-eskom holdings.

tsn: re rile naga e, e ya go tsibogela ditlhokwa le ditlhologelo tsa batho, mme e ya go nna naga e e dirang botoka, e ntse e direla ka lobelo lo lo okeditsweng.
xho: u-eskom uza kuqhubekeka ukwakha amandla okuvelisa aze aphucule indlela yokulolonga izikhululo zakhe.

tsn: ponagalo e e itlhaolang ya botsamaisi jono e ya go nna gore bo itse gore batho ba tshela kae, bo tlhaloganya ditlhokwa tsa batho mme bo tsibogela ditlhokwa tse, ka lobelo lo lo okeditsweng.
xho: ukuqinisekisa ukukhuthaza uqoqosho oluquka wonke umntu, ukuncedisa nokuphuhlisa, siye saseka ibhunga lokucebisa lokuxhotyiswa kwabamnyama ngokubanzi kwezoqoqosho, usihlalo walo ngumongameli.

tsn: puso e tshwanetse go dira ka lobelo lo lo okeditsweng, ka natla go gaisa mme e le ka manontlhotlho.
xho: eyona ngqwalasela intsha ingxamisekileyo lutshintsho lomgaqo-nkqubo ekufuneka ibe ngamangenelelo okudala amathuba emisebenzi yabantu abatsha.

tsn: re lebeletse gore khuduthamaga le bodiredipuso bo inaakanye le maitlhomo a. re aga naga e e sokegetseng mo go direng le go diragatseng, mme re dira jaana ka go tokafatsa thulaganyo mmogo le kelotlhoko ya tiragatso le tlhatlhobo.
xho: kuza kwenziwa iziphakamiso zokuncedisa kwiindleko zokuqeshwa kwabasebenzi abasebatsha, ukukhuthaza iifemu ukuba ziqeshe abasebenzi abangenamava.

tsn: re tlhoka le go nyalanya maiteko a tekatekanyo ya bong le lenaneo la tiro la puso.
xho: okunye ukwandiswa kwenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu nako kusendleleni.

tsn: tiro e e tla netefatsa gore basadi, baswa le digole ba fitlhelela tshono ya tlhabololo.
xho: oku kuquka iziseko zoncedo zasekhaya neeprojekti zamaziko emfundo ephakamileyo neeprojekti zezakhono zokufunda nokubhala, unakekelo lwezempilo lasekhaya, ukunakekelwa kwezikolo namaphulo okuphuhliswa kwabantwana abasakhulayo.

tsn: tiro ya mafapha e tla lekanyetswa ka dipoelo tse di tlhamilweng go ya ka thulaganyo kelotlhoko ya tiragatso le tlhatlhobo.
xho: sathi iya kuba sisizwe esihoyana neemfuno neminqweno yabantu, esisebenza ngcono nangokukhawuleza.

tsn: tumalano e, e tla tlhalosa se se tshwanetseng go dirwa, gore se dirwa jang, ke mang, mo pakeng e e kae, go dirisiwa tekanyetso le didirisiwa dife.
xho: olona phawu lubalulekileyo kolu lawulo iza kuba kukuba luyabazi abantu ukuba bahlala phi na, luyaziqonda iimfuno zabo kwaye lusabela ngokukhawuleza.

tsn: jaaka lo setse lo itse, re itlametse ditlapele tse tlhano:thuto, boitekanelo, tlhabololo ya metsemagae le bonno jwa batho, go tlhama ditiro tse di eletsegang, le go lwantsha bosenyi.
xho: urhulumente kufuneka asebenze ngokukhawuleza, ngamandla nangcono.

tsn: go tlaleletsa fa, re tla dira ka natla go tokafatsa boleng jwa pusoselegae, tlhabololo ya dipopotheo lebonno jwa batho.
xho: siza kulindela ukuba iinkonzo zesigqeba nezoluntu ukuba ziwuthobele lo mbono.

tsn: re beile thuto le tlhabololo ya bokgoni jaaka pinagare ya dipholesi tsa puso.
xho: sakha isizwe esisekelezelwe ekwenziweni komsebenzi, ngokuphucula ucwangciso kwakunye nohlolo novavanyo lomsebenzi.

tsn: mo lenaneong la rona la 2010, re eletsa go tokafatsa bokgoni jwa bana ba rona jwa go buisa, go kwala le go bala mo dingwageng tsa kgato ya motheo.
xho: sikwafuna ukuquka amanyathelo okulingana ngokwesini kwinkqubo yomsebenzi karhulumente.

tsn: fa re sa dire se, re ka se ka ra tokafatsa boleng jwa thuto.
xho: la manyathelo ayakuqinisekisa ukuba abantu ababhinqileyo, abantwana nabantu abakhubazekileyo bayakwazi ukufikelela kumathuba ophuhliso.

tsn: dintlhanaikaelelo tsa rona ka ga thuto di bonolo, le gale di botlhokwa.
xho: sinovuyo ukwazisa ngendlela entsha yokusebenza kurhulumente.

tsn: re batla baithuti le barutabana ba nne kwa sekolong, mo phaposing, ka nako, ba ithuta le go ruta, diura di le supa ka letsatsi.
xho: imisebenzi yamasebe iya kulinganiswa ngemiphumela, ephuhliswe ngenkqubo yethu yohlolo novavanyo lomsebenzi.

tsn: go baithuti, re tla ba abela dibukatiro tse di ka dirisiwang bonolo, ka dipuo tsotlhe tse 11. go simolola monogwaga go ya pele, baithuti botlhe ba dikereite 3, 6 le 9 ba tla kwala diteko tsa puisokwalo le thutapalo tse di tla lekanyediwang ke balekanyetsi ba ba ikemetseng.
xho: njengoko nisazi, sizibophelele kwiindawo zantlanu eziphambili emakuqalwe ngazo: ezemfundo, ezempilo, uphuhliso lwamaphandle novuselelo lomhlaba, ukudala umsebenzi ofanelekileyo, nokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho.

tsn: re ikaelela go oketsa kelo ya phalolo ya diteko tse go tloga palogareng ya gajaana ya 35% le 40% go ya go bonnye, 60% ka 2014. dipholo di tla romelelwa batsadi gore ba sale morago tswelelopele ya bana.
xho: ukongeza, siza kusebenzela ukuphucula ukusebenza koorhulumente basekhaya, uphuhliso lweziseko zoncedo neendawo zokuhlala koluntu.

tsn: re ikaelela go oketsa palo ya baithuti ba materiki ba ba ka kgonang go amogelwa kwa diyunibesithing go ya go 175 000 ka ngwaga ka 2014. re rotloetsa batsadi go dirisana le rona go netefatsa katlego se.
xho: ingqwalasela yethu enkulu siyibeke kwezemfundo nasekuphuhlisweni kwezakhono kwimigaqo-nkqubo yalo rhulumente.

tsn: re itumelela pego ya kgwedi e e fetileng ka mekgatlho e meraro ya barutisi.
xho: kwinkqubo yethu yama-2010, sifuna ukuphucula amandla abantwana bethu okufunda, ukubhala nokubala kwakwiminyaka yabo yokuqala.

tsn: naptosa, sadtu le saou, foo ba neng ba boeletsa boitlamo jwa bona malebana le kgoeletso ya boleng jo bo kwa godimo jwa go ithuta le go ruta go simolola ka 2010. maloko a a tlotlegang,re tlhoka go beeletsa mo basweng go tlhomamisa gore re nna le mophato wa badiri o o nang le bokgoni jwa go tshegetsa kgolo le tlholego ya ditiro.
xho: asisokuze siwuphucule umgangatho wemfundo, ngaphandle kokuba senze oku.

tsn: ka jalo, re rulaganyetsa go oketsa le go godisa katiso ya baswa ba dingwaga di le 16-25 malebana le ditirelo tsa thuto le katiso e e tswelelang.
xho: sifuna ukuba abafundi kunye nootitshala babe sesikolweni, emagumbini okufundela, ngexesha, bafunde kwaye bafundise iiyure ezisixhenxe ngosuku.

tsn: se, se tla re kgontsha go neela baithuti ba ba sa lekanelang yunibesithi, tshono ya go rutega.
xho: siza kuncedisa ootitshala ngokubabonelela ngezicwangciso zemihla ngemihla zezifundo ezineenkcukacha.

tsn: re dira mmogo le ditheo tsa thuto e kgolwane go netefatsa gore baithuti ba ba nang le tshwanelo ya go amogelwa, ba bona thuso ya madi, ka mosele wa sekema sa setshaba sa thuso ya matlole sa baithuti.
xho: abafundi, siyakuba bonelela ngeencwadi zokusebenzela ekulula ukuzisebenzisa ezifumaneka ngeelwimi ezili-11.

tsn: re beile dintlhaphitlhelelo tsa maemogodimo tsa tlhabololo ya bokgoni, go oketsa palo ya baenjenere le bategeniki, le go oketsa palo ya barutabana ba ba nonofileng ba mmetse mmogo le bonetetshi.
xho: ukusukela kulo nyaka ukuya phambili, bonke abafundi bebanga le-3, le-6 nele-9 baya kubhala uvavanyo lokufunda nokubhala nolwezibalo oluphononongwe ngokuzimeleyo.

tsn: re tshwanetse ra oketsa le palo ya baswa ba ba tsenelang dithutela tirong mo maphateng a poraefete mmogo le a puso.
xho: sizimisele ukwandisa izinga lempumelelo kolu vavanyo lisuke kwizinga lomlinganiso ophakathi wangoku ophakathi kwama-35 nama-40% ukuya kuma-60% ngowama-2014 ubuncinane.

tsn: re utlwanetse bolekane le bankatlhabololo ya borwa jwa aforika, malebana le go tokafatsa bodiredi jwa dikokelo tsa puso mmogo le dikantoro tsa dikgaolo.
xho: siyayamkela intetho eyenziwe yimibutho yootitshala, i-naptosa, sadtu ne-saou, xa bengqina ukuzibophelela kwabo kwiphulo lokufunda nokufundisa okusemgangathweni ukususela ekuqaleni kowama-2010.

tsn: re bile re dirisana le bankatlhabololo ya aforika borwa (dbsa) mmogo le koporasi ya tsweletso ya madirelo.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,kufanele sidale ihlumelo kulutsha lwethu ukuqinisekisa abasebenzi abanezakhono nabakwaziyo ukusebenza ukuxhasa ukukhula nokudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi.

tsn: tirisano ya rona e ka mananeo a motlhakanelwa a puso-poraefete, go tlhabolola dikokelo le go aba matlole go diporojeke.
xho: ngako oko siceba ukwandisa uqeqesho lwababudala buphakathi kwe-16 ?

tsn: re ya go fokotsa dintsho tsa masea ka tiriso ya mananeo a a kwenneng a moento.
xho: 25 kumaziko okwandisa imfundo noqeqesho.

tsn: re ya go diragatsa maitlamo otlhe a a tserweng ka letsatsi la lefatshe la aids, maitlamo a a amanang le mekgwa e meswa ya thibelo le kalafo ya hiv.
xho: oku kuza kusivumela ukuba sinike abo bangakulungelanga ukungena eyunivesiti ngokwemfundo, ithuba lesibini kwimfundo.

tsn: re tshwaragane le tiro e e makitla go netefatsa gore tiro e, e diragala mo nakong e e utlwanetsweng.
xho: sisebenzisana namaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi abafanelekileyo bafumana uncedo lwemali, ngesikimu soncedo lwezezimali lwabafundi sesizwe.

tsn: re ya go tsweletsa tiro ya rona go fokotsa bokebekwa jo bogolo, le go netefatsa gore thulaganyo ya bosiamisi e dira ka tolamo.
xho: kwakhona sizibekele ngebhongo iinjongo eziphambili zophuhliso lwezakhono, ukuvelisa iinjineli namagcisa ongezelelweyo, nokwandisa inani lootitshala abalungele ukufundisa izibalo nenzululwazi.

tsn: re tsenya tirisong dithulaganyo tsa go oketsa palo ya mapodisi ka 10% mo dingwageng tse tharo tse di latelang.
xho: kufuneka sandise inani lolutsha olungenela uqeqesho emisebenzini kumacandelo abucala nawakarhulumente.

tsn: re lemogile le go tlhaola jaaka ditlapele, ntwa kgatlhanong le go thopiwa ka dikgoka, thukutho ya mafelokgwebo le matlo, mmogo le bonokwane bo tshwana le polao, petelelo le kgobatso.
xho: oku kuquka ukwakhiwa nokuphuculwa kwezibhedlele neekliniki, nokuqhubekeka ukuphucula iimeko abasebenza phantsi kwazo abasebenzi bonakekelo lwezempilo.

tsn: fa re dirisana re tla fenya bosenyibakaulengwe le baeng ba tlotlego,pusoselegae e tshwanetse go dira.
xho: ngoko ke senza amangenelela okunciphisa izinga lokubhubha kwabantwana abazalwayo, ukunciphisa usuleleko olutsha lwentsholongwane kagawulayo kwakunye nokunyanga ngokuvakalayo intsholongwane kagawulayo nesifo sephepha.

tsn: bommasepala ba tshwanetse go tokafatsa thebolo ya matlo, metsi, kgeleloleswe, motlakase, taolo ya matlakala le ditsela.
xho: kwakhona siza kunciphisa ukubhubha kweentsana ngenkqubo yokugonya ngokobuninzi.

tsn: re bile re etetse merafe le bommasepala ba ba farologaneng, go akarediwa balfour kwa mpumalanga mmogo le thembisa kwa gauteng.
xho: siza kuphumeza zonke izivumelwano ezenziwa ngomhla kagawulayo wehlabathi ngokumalunga nothintelo olutsha lwentsholongwane kagawulayo namanyathelo onyango.

tsn: re laetse badiredi ba semolao gore ba gagamatse ditomo mo botlhokataolong jwa kwa balfour le dikarolo tse dingwe.
xho: siza kuwuqhubela phambili umsebenzi wethu ukuciphisa ulwaphulo-mthetho olumasikizi nolunobundlongondlongo, nokuqinisekisa ukuba inkqubo yezobulungisa isebenza ngokuvakalayo.

tsn: re tshwaragane le go tlhabolola mekhukhu mmogo le go tlhoma ditirelo tse di tlhamatsegang go bonnye jwa malapa a le 500 000 ka 2014. re rulaganya go beela thoko dihekethara di feta 6 000 tsa naga ya puso e e mo felong go isegang, go aga matlo a a tlhwatlwa tlase.
xho: sityumbe ukulwana nokuqweqwediswa, ukukhuthuza kwasekhaya nokwamashishini, kwakunye nolwaphulo-mthetho oluphakathi komntu nomtu olufana nobugebenga, ukudlwengula nokuhlasela, njengeendawo eziphambili ekufanele kuqalwe ngazo.

tsn: re ya go tlhoma ketleetso ya r1 bilione go tlhotlha dibanka tsa poraefete mmogo le lekala la matlo go aga dikumo go tlhokomela kgwetlho e ya matlo.
xho: masithathe inxaxheba kumaqonga okhuseleko nabahlali.

tsn: ra re ba tshwanetse go nna le ditikwatikwe tsa metshameko gammogo le tsa marekelo jaaka kwa ditoropong.
xho: masisoloko sikulungele ukunika amapolisa ulwazi malunga nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho.

tsn: go tloga motsi o, go agilwe matlo a le 231. go nnile le tswelopele mo neelong ya ditirelo go tshegetsa tlhabololo ya tsa temo, mmogo le katiso ya ditokololo tsa morafe.
xho: bantu bakuthi neendwendwe ezibalulekileyo,oorhulumente basekhaya kufuneka basebenze.

tsn: mananeo a a tla tswela mosola dikgaolotlhopho di le 21. fa 2014 o rogwa, re ikaelela go nna le mafelo mo dikgaolotlhophong di le 160. re eletsa gore 60% ya malapa mo mafelong a e kgone go fitlhelela ditlhokego tsa bona tsa dijo go tswa dikumong tsaabo ka ngwaga wa 2014. kgato ka kgato re tla bo re fitlhe jaaka seane se re bakaulengwe, dilo tse kgolo di simolola ka dikgato tse dinnye.
xho: oku kusinike umfanekiso wemiceli mingeni oorhulumente basekhaya abajongene nayo.

tsn: re lebanwe gape ke go nyalana mananeo tshegetso a tlhabololo ya naga mmogo le temo.
xho: kwakhona sikwatyelele neendawo abantu abahlala kuzo, kuquka nebalfour empumalanga nethembisa egauteng.

tsn: mo karolong e katlego ya rona e tla lekanyetswa ka koketsego ya palo ya balemipotlana ba ba nnang balemibagolo.
xho: emva kotyelelo lwasebalfour, sithumele iqela lomphathiswa elimalungu alithoba ukuba lityelele lommandla ukuze lisombulule le miba ibiphakanyiswe ngabahlali.

tsn: le fa go le jalo, re latlhegelwa ke metsi a le mantsi ka ntata ya dipeipe tse di dutlang le dipopotheo tse di sa lekanelang.
xho: ndiyalele ukuba abaphathiswa mabahoyane nemiba esaseleyo.

tsn: re ya go bopa maano a go fokotsa tatlhegelo ya metsi ka seripa fa 2014 a rogwa.
xho: siya phinda sithi akukho nasiphi na isikhalazo esifunisa ubundlongondlongo nokutshatyalaliswa kwempahla.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,jaaka karolo ya maiteko a rona a go rotloetsa kgolo ya ikonomi, re dira ka natla go fokotsa ditshenyegelo tsa tlhaeletsano.
xho: siyalele i-arhente zabezomthetho ukuba zithabathe amanyathelo aqatha kuwo nawuphi na umbodamo osebalfour nakwezinye iindawo.

tsn: morafe wa aforika borwa o ka solofela phokotso ya kelo ya tlhotlhwa ya go dirisa mogala wa selefounu, wa fa gae mmogo le wa botlhe.
xho: kweyomga yama-2009, ikhabhinethi iphumeze isicwangciso-qhinga sokudala inguqu koorhulumente basekhaya.

tsn: re ya go dira ka natla go oketsa lebelo la kgolagano, ka maikaelelo a go netefatsa maemogodimo a tirelo ya ditirelo tsa inthanete, re inaakantse le moono wa boditshabatshaba.
xho: oku kuya kuqinisekisa ukuba oorhulumente basekhaya banolawulo olufanelekileyo, izakhono zezolawulo nezobugcisa ezifanelekileyo.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho, puso e ya go netefatsa gore dithoto tsa rona tsa tikologo mmogo le madirelo a tlhago di a tlhokomelwa le go atlarelwa ka gale.
xho: kuwo lo nyaka wokuba kusetyenzwe, masisebenzisane ukwenza oorhulumente basekhaya babe ngumsebenzi wonmtu wonke.

tsn: re akgetse go bonala malebana le tumallano e e amogetsweng kwa pitsokgolong ya phetogo ya tlelaemete ya copenhagen ka sedimonthole ngogola, re na le dinaga tsa brazil, india le china, mmogo le united states e e neng e emetse dinaga tse di tlhabologileng.
xho: sijonge ekuphuculeni iindawo zokuhlala zasematyotyombeni ezimi kwindawo entle size sinikezele ngeenkonzo ezifanelekileyo nelungelo lokuhlala isigxina kwimizi engama-500 000 ubuncinane ngowama-2014.

tsn: le fa tumallano e e sa fitlha fa re neng re solofetse, e nnile kgato ya botlhokwa ka gobo e bofa dinaga tsotlhe go tsibogela phetogo ya tlelaemete.
xho: siceba ukubekela bucala ngaphezulu kweehektare ezingama-6 000 omhlaba karhulumente osendaweni entle ukwenzela ukwakha izindlu zabo bamivuzo iphantsi nezifikelelekayo.

tsn: mo aforika borwa re itlametse ntlhaphitlhelelo ya phokotsotsweletso e e rileng mme re ya go tswelela go dira ka natla malebana le maano a rona a tsereganyo ya phetogo ya leruri ya tlelaemete.
xho: iphulo elitsha elingundoqo liya kuba kukulungiselela abo bamivuzo iphezulu ukuba bangafumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente, kodwa besamkela kancinci kakhulu ukuba bangafumana imali-mboleko yebhanki eqhelekileyo yokuthenga indlu.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,re ya go nonotsha maitlhomo a go godisa dikgatlhegelo tsa aforika borwa mo lefatsheng ka bophara.
xho: siza kuseka ingxowa-mali yesiqinisekiso se-r1 sebhiliyoni ukukhuthaza iibhanki zabucala necandelo lezezindlu, ukuba ziphuhlise imveliso entsha ukukhawulelana noku kufuneka kwezindlu.

tsn: re tla tshegetsa maiteko a go oketsa lebelo la go nyalanya dinaga tsa sadc malebana le polotiki le ikonomi, mmogo le go rotloetsa kgwebo le peeletso magareng a dinaga tse.
xho: bantu bakuthi,kunyaka ophelileyo sathi, abantu basemaphandleni nabo banelungelo lokuba nombane, amanzi, izindlu zangasese ezigungxulwayo neendlela.

tsn: aforika borwa e tswelela go nna moeteledipele mo maitekong a go natlafatsa kitlano ya aforika mmogo le makala a yona go direla kopano.
xho: sathi kufanele babe neendawo zezemidlalo kunye neendawo zokuthenga ezinkulu neziphucukileyo njengezasezidolophini.

tsn: re ya go tsepamisa maatla mo tsosolosong ya semphatho se se ntshwa sa tlhabololo ya aforika jaaka maano a tlhabololo ya ikonomi ya kontinente.
xho: kule meko, sisungule isiza selinge lokuqala lenkqubo yophuhliso olubanzi lwasemaphandleni egiyani, elimpopo, kweyethupha kulo nyaka uphelileyo.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,bodiredipuso bo tshwanela ke go tsibogela kgoeletso e go dira gore paka e e nne ya tiro e e potlakileng le go tokafatsa tiragatso ya puso.
xho: inkqubela phambili yokubonelela ngeziseko zoncedo ukuxhasa uphuhliso lwezolimo, noqeqesho lwabahlali seyenziwe nayo.

tsn: puso e setse e dira ka tlhabololo le go tsenya tirisong mananeo a tlhabololo ya badiredi puso a a yang go ala motheo wa badiredi puso mo mefameng yotlhe.
xho: ufikelelo kumaziko ezempilo nawezemfundo sele luphuculiwe.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,re tsweletsa maiteko a rona a go fedisa bomenemene le botsietsi mo tsamaisong ya dithendara mmogo le mo dikopong tsa makwalokgweetso, madi a tlamelo a puso le makwalo ikitsiso gareng ga tse dingwe.
xho: siphumeza iinkqubo ezifanayo kwiziza ezisixhenxe elizweni jikelele, oku kuza kuxhamlisa iwodi ezingama-21.

tsn: komiti ya rona ya ditona, e e lebileng bomenemene, e sekaseka tsela ya leruri ya go fenya bomenemene.
xho: kancinci kancinci kuza kude kulunge, bantu bakuthi, kuthiwa nenkqayi iqala ngentlontlo.

tsn: bakaulengwe,jaaka lo lemogile, re itsisitse mogala o o kgethegileng wa moporesidente gore puso mmogo le kantoro ya moporesidente di fitlhelelwe bonolo ke setshaba le go thibolola thebolelo ya ditirelo.
xho: impumelelo yethu kule ndawo iya kubonakala ngokwanda kwenani lamafama ezinga elincinci athi akhule aphuhle kwezoqoqosho.

tsn: mogala o o kgethegileng ke sekai sa maikaelelo a rona a go dira dilo ka tsela e e farologaneng mo pusong.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo nosihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo,asisilo lizwe lityebileyo kwicala lokuba namanzi.

tsn: re ka bolela ka leina mohumagadi buziwe ngaleka wa kwa mount frere yo o nnileng motho wa ntlha go letsetsa mogala o a ngongorega ka tsamaiso ya phensene ya moswi mogatse.
xho: uluntu lwasemzantsi afrika lungalindela okunye ukuthotywa kwamaxabiso othungelwano-maza, umnxeba weselula, umnxeba wocingo kunye namaxabiso eminxeba kawonkewonke.

tsn: re na gape fano le rre nkululeko cele, yo o neng a thusega go bona lekwalo ikitsiso le le mo kgontshitseng go ikwadisa kwa yunibesithing ya tshwane ya thekenoloji.
xho: siza kusebenzela ukwandisa isantya sothungelwano-maza nokuqinisekisa izinga eliphezulu lenkonzo ye-intaneti, ngokuhambelana nemigangatho yezizwe ngezizwe.

tsn: ka tiriso ya mmusakgotla re laleditse boemedi jwa makokomantsi go tswa palamenteng go etela lefelo la mogala o gore ditokololo tsa palamente di itemogele bogolo jwa tiro e e dirwang koo.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,lo rhulumente uza kuqinisekisa ukuba indalo yethu nemithombo yethu yendalo ikhuseleke kakuhle, kwaye ixhotyiswa rhoqo.

tsn: bakaulengwe le ditsala,ke tlhalositse dintlhakgolo tsa thulaganyo ya rona ya 2010 e bong maitlamo a rona a motlhakanelwa jaaka puso go baagi ba aforika bowa.
xho: sikunye nebrazil, i-india nechina, kwangenelela ne-united states, emele ihlabathi eliphuhlileyo, senze igalelo elincomekayo kwisivumelwano esamkelwa kwindibano engokuguquguquka kwemozulu ebisecopenhagen kweyomnga kulo nyaka uphelileyo.

tsn: puo ya maemo a setshaba a neela tebokakaretso ya thulaganyo ya rona ya tiro.
xho: nangona singahambi ngangokuba kulindelekile nje, linyathelo elibalulekileyo ukubheka phambili kuba sibophelela onke amazwe ukuba kubekho into ayenzayo ngokuguquguquka kwemozulu.

tsn: ditona di tla neela diteng ka nako ya tsona ya puo ya boutu ya tekanyetso.
xho: siza kusebenza ngokuthe chatha kunye noogxa bethu bezizwe ngezizwe sisebenzela isivumelwano esibophelela ngokusemthethweni.

tsn: maloko a a tlotlegang,maaforika borwa a gaetsho, ka kgwedi ya ngwanatsele monongwaga re tla bo re keteka dingwaga di le 150 go tloga motsi wa kgorogo ya maintia mo aforika borwa.
xho: njengomzantsi afrika, sizibophelele ngokuzithandela kwiinjongo eziphambili ezibaluliweyo zokunciphisa ungcoliseko, kwaye siza kuqhubekeka ukusebenzisa isicwangciso-qhinga sethu sokunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwemozulu sexesha elide.

tsn: se se re neela tshono ya go lemoga seabe sa botlhokwa sa morafe wa maintia mo dikarolong tsa bodiri, kgwebo, bonetetshi, metshameko, tumedi, botsweretshi, setso le katlego mmogo le tiiseletso ya demokerasi ya rona.
xho: siza kuwaxhasa amalinge okukhawulezisa indibaniselwano yepolitiki neyoqoqosho yommandla wenkqubo yokuphuhliswa kwamazwe e-afrika esemazantsi (i-sadc), nokukhuthaza urhwebo notyalo-mali phakathi kulo mmandla.

tsn: bakaulengwe le ditsala,nte ke dirise tshono eno go boa ke isa matshediso a rona go tswa botennye jwa pelo go puso mmogo le baagi ba haiti ka masetlapelo a dira-ga-di-bonwe a a ba wetseng.
xho: umzantsi afrika usaqhubekeka ukudlala indima ephambili kumalinge elizwekazi ukomeleza imanyano yamazwe ase-afrika kunye neziseko zayo, nokusebenzela umanyano.

tsn: ke rata mo nakong eno go lemoga le go amogela moaforika yo ka gale a sa itsapeng go thusa mo dinakong tsa matlhotlhapelo a tshwana le a. moaforika yo o thusa go godisa maitlhomo a morafe o o tlhokomelang.
xho: siza kunikezela amandla ekuvuseleleni ubudlelwane obutsha bophuhliso lwe-afrika, njengesicwangciso-qhinga sophuhliso loqoqosho kwilizwekazi.

tsn: re amogela fano mo ntlung e ngaka imtiaz sooliman wa gift of the givers.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,inkonzo karhulumente isabele kubizo lokwenza eli ixesha lokuqala lokusebenza msinyane nokuphuculwa komsebenzi karhulumente.

tsn: dipopotheo, tshireletso mmogo le dintsanantsana tsa paakanyetso di rulagantswe go netefatsa katlego ya metshameko e ya kgwele dinao.
xho: urhulumente sele esebenzela uphuhliso nokuphunyezwa kwenkqubo yophuhliso lwenkonzo karhulumente, oluya kucacisa indlela nomgangatho wokuziphatha kwabasebenzi bakarhulumente kuwo onke amazinga.

tsn: morafe otlhe o isa malebogo a boikokobetso go komiti ya dithulaganyo ya selegae ka matsapa a bona.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,siyaqhubekeka ngamalinge wethu okuncothula urhwaphilizo nenkohliso ekunikezelweni kwemisebenzi neenkqubo zeziniki maxabiso, nakwizicelo zeempepha mvume zokuqhuba, inkxaso-mali karhulumente yezentlalo namaxwebhu ezazisi, phakathi kwezinye.

tsn: maaforika borwa a gaetsho,jaaka re keteka kgololesego ya ga madiba mo tsatsing je, re boeletsa maitlamo a rona malebana le poelano, kitlano ya setshaba, go tlhoka kgethololo semorafe mmogo le go aga bokamoso jo bo botoka re le mmogo jaaka maaforika borwa, bantsho le basweu.
xho: bantu bakuthi,njengoko nisazi, savelisa umnxeba kamongameli ongavalwayo ukwenza ufikelelo kurhulumente nakumongameli lube lula ngakumbi kuluntu, nokunceda ukususa imiqobo ekunikezelo nkonzo.

tsn: re kaelwa ke se se builweng ke madiba kwa kgotlatshekelo, ke mo nopola ka tlhamalalo:?
xho: lo mnxeba ungavalwayo ubonakalisa ukuzimisela kwethu ekwenzeni izinto ngendlela eyahlukileyo eburhulumenteni.

tsn: mo nakong ya botshelo jwa me ke ineeletse go kgaratlhela batho ba aforika.
xho: lo mnxeba wenze umahluko kubomi babemi bomzantsi afrika abaninzi.

tsn: 13 feb 2014mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegang wa kokoanotheomolao ya bosetšhaba,modulasetulo wa lekgotla la bosetšhaba la diporofense (ncop).
xho: 13 feb 2014somlomo ohloniphekileyo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe,sihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo (i-ncop).

tsn: motlatsammusakgotla wa kokoanotheomolao ya bosetšhaba le motlatsamodulasetulo wa ncop.
xho: sekela somlomo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe nosekela sihlalo we-ncop.

tsn: motlatsamoporesitente wa rephaboliki, motlotlegi kgalema motlanthe.
xho: sekela mongameli werhiphabliki, ohloniphekileyo ukgalema montlanthe.

tsn: motlatsamoporesitente wa maloba, baleka mbethe,motlotlegi moatlhodimogolo wa rephaboliki, le ditokololo tsotlhe tse di tlotlegang tsa bosiamisi.
xho: owayesakuba ngusekela mongameli ubaleka mbethe,ehloniphekileyo ijaji eyintloko, nawo onke amalungu ahloniphekileyo ecandeloleenkundla.

tsn: ditona le batlatsatona ba ba tlotlegang,ditonakgolo tse di tlotlegang le babusakgotla ba diporofense tsa rona.
xho: kubaphathiswa abahloniphekileyo nakoosekela baphathiswa,kwiinkulumbuso ezihloniphekileyo noosomlomo bamaphondo.

tsn: modulasetulo wa mokgatlho wa dipusoselegae tsa aforika borwa, le boeteledipele jotlhe jwa pusoselegae.
xho: kusihlalo webhunga loomasipala basemzantsi afrika (i-salga), kunye nazo zonke iinkokheli zoorhulumente basekhaya.

tsn: ditlhogo tsa ditheo tsa karolo ya bo 9 tsa puso tseo di tshegetsang temokerasi ya molaotheo.
xho: kwintloko zamaziko karhulumente axhasa intando yesininzi.

tsn: baeteledipele go tswa kwa maphateng a kgwebo, metshameko, setso, bodumedi le a mangwe otlhe fela,ditokololo tsa ditheo tsa sedipolomate, baeng ba ba kgethegileng e bile ba tlotlega,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,maaforika borwa ka nna,good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeienaand.
xho: kwirhuluneli yebhanki enguvimba,kwiinkokheli zezoshishino, zezemidlalo, zezemveli, zezenkolo nezawo onke amacandelo,kumalungu wezozakuzo, kwiindwendwe ezikhethekileyo nezibalulekileyo,kumalungu ahloniphekileyo,bemi zomzantsi afrikagood evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeienaand.

tsn: ke rata go leboga batlhankedi ba tsamaiso ka tšhono eno ya go bua le batho ba aforika borwa, mo tiragalong eno ya puo ya bofelo ya maemo a setšhaba ya puso ya bone ya temokerasi.
xho: ndinqwenela ukubulela amagosa awongameleyo ngeli thuba lokuthetha nabantu basemzantsi afrika, kulo msitho wentetho kamongameli engobume besizwe (i-sona), yokugqibela kolu lawulo lwesine lwentando yesininzi.

tsn: ke rata go fetisa matshediso le kutlobotlhoko ya rona ka go tlhokafala ga motlotlegi ben skhosana, mongwe wa ditokololo tse di dirileng sebaka go gaisa le mongwe wa bagolwane ba ntlo eno e e tlotlegang e bile e kile ya nna tona ya rona ya maloba ya ditirelo tsa kgopololo.
xho: ndithanda ukudlulisa amazwi wethu wovelwano olunzulu ngokushiywa kwethu ngongasekhoyo ohloniphekileyo umnu.

tsn: mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegang,modulasetilo yo o tlotlegang wa ncop,seno ke puo ya ntlha ya maemo a setšhaba e e diragalang re se na le moporesidente wa rona wa ntlha, motlotlegi nelson rolihlahla mandela.
xho: ben skhosana, omnye wawona malungu asebenze ithuba elide nokwalelinye lawona malungu aphezulu wale ndlu ihloniphekileyo nowayesakuba ngumphathiswa wethu weenkonzo zezoluleko.

tsn: go tlhokafala ga gagwe, pele fela ga ngwaga wa bo20 wa kgololesego le temokerasi ya rona, go utlwisitse batho ba rona le ba ba kwa ntle ga melelwane ya rona botlhoko jo bo seng kana ka sepe.
xho: sibuhlungu kakhulu kukusishiya kwakhe ngesiquphe.

tsn: re ikgomotsa ka kitso ya gore madiba o tla nna ka gale a le mo dipelong tsa rona, le gore re na le maikarabelo a go tsweletsa boswa jwa gagwe.
xho: sidlulisa uvelwano lwethu olunzulu kusapho lwakhe, nakwinkokheli ye-inkatha freedom party (i-ifp) ushenge, kunye nawo onke amalungu we-ifp.

tsn: ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,naga ya rona e tlhagisitse banna le basadi ba ba gaisang, ba ba tlametseng ka boeteledipele mo dinakong tse di thata.
xho: sidlulisa ukukhala kwethu emndenini wakhe, nakumholi we ifp ushenge, kanye namalunga onke e-ifp.

tsn: mongwe wa baeteledipele bao e ne e le rre moses kotane, motsholamatlotlokakaretso wa maloba wa anc le mokwaledikakaretso wa maloba wa mokgatlho wa bokomonese wa aforika borwa.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo,sihlalo ohloniphekileyo we-ncop,le yi-sona yokuqala eqhubeka engasekho umongameli owayengumseki wentando yesininzi yethu, ohloniphekileyo unelson rolihlahla mandela.

tsn: gape re tlotla moporesidente wa maloba wa anc, rre oliver tambo, yo a neng a tsweletse go sedimosa lesedi la kgololesego mo gae le kwa moseja ka dinako tse di neng di le thata go gaisa tsa kgaratlho ya rona.
xho: ukusishiya kwakhe, kanye xa sisecicini lokufika konyaka wama-20 wenkululeko yethu nolawulo lwentando yesininzi, kubangele intlungu enkulu kubantu bakuthi nangaphaya kwemida yethu.

tsn: re tlotla solomon mahlangu, lekawana le le pelokgale le le neng la kalediwa le ntse le ititeile sefuba ka 1979 koo a bolailweng gona a na le dingwaga di le 23. o rile: "madi a me a tla nontsha setlhare se se tla ungwang maungo a kgololesego.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,ilizwe lethu livelise amadoda namakhosikazi agqamileyo, athe abonakalise ubunkokheli ngamaxesha anzima.

tsn: "re motlotlo go amogela mmaagwe, mama martha mahlangu le setlogolo sa gagwe, bathabile.
xho: siwongekile kukuba nenkosikazi yakhe ethandekayo phakathi kwethu, umama urebecca kotane, njengendwendwe lethu elikhethekileyo ngobu busuku.

tsn: gape ngwaga wa 2014 o supa segopotso sa bo40 sa polao ya bogatlapa ka sephuthelwana sa bomo, ya moeteledipele wa baithuti, abaram onkgopotse tiro ka 1974 kwa botswana.
xho: umama ukotane ugqibe iminyaka eli-102 ubudala izolo, kwaye simnqwenelela okuhle kodwa.

tsn: re gopola botlhe ba ba tlhokafetseng ka nako ya dikhuduego tse di neng di etleediwa ke mmuso ka dingwaga tsa bo1980 le 1990 kwa makeišeneng le kwa metseng ya rona ya kwa magaeng.
xho: sikwakhumbula ngokunika imbeko owayesakuba ngumongameli we-anc umnu oliver tambo, owagcina isibane senkululeko siphila (ithemba lenkululeko liphila) apha ekhaya nakumazwe angaphesheya ngawona maxesha ayengawona anzima omzabalazo.

tsn: mme jabu ndlovu, moemedi wa maloba wa badiri wa mokgatlho wa bosetšhaba wa badirakatshipi ba aforika borwa, o ne a thuntshiwa ka 1988 kwa pietermaritzburg mmogo le mogatse jabulani le morwa wa bona.
xho: unyana wakhe udali nenkosikazi yakhe urachel bayinxalenye yethu kulo msitho wangokuhlwa nje.

tsn: re amogela morwadie luhle le morwa, sanele, mme re tlotla malapa otlhe a a latlhegetsweng ke baratiwa ba ona, go ralala mekgatlho yotlhe ya sepolotiki.
xho: sikhahlela usolomon mahlangu, iqhaji lomfana elaya ngokudela ekuxhonyweni ngowe-1979 apho wathi wabulawa ngokwesigwebo eminyaka ingama-23 ubudala.

tsn: mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegang,modulasetilo yo o tlotlegang wa ncop,re kgonne go fenya kutlobotlhoko eo yotlhe ya maloba le go aga setšhaba se sentšhwa.
xho: baze baqhubekeke ngokuzabalaza.”siwongekile kukusindleka umama wakhe, umama umartha mahlangu kunye nomzukulwana wakhe ubathabile.

tsn: re fitlhile mmuso o e neng e se wa temokerasi, o o neng o se na kemedi, o gatelela e bile o le bobodu o o neng o direla ba le mmalwa fela.
xho: siyamamkela umntakwabo, umogomotsi tiro kulo msitho.

tsn: re tlhamile mmuso wa temokerasi o o kopaneng, o o sa tlhaoleng go ya ka lotso le fa e le ka bong, o o ikarabelang mo baemeding ba maaforika borwa otlhe.
xho: sivakalisa umbulelo wabantu bakuthi, ngokuzenza idini komntakwabo engakhathalelanga siqu sakhe kuphela.

tsn: re na le temokerasi ya molaotheo e e tlhaga, e e nang le maphata a a dirang sentle a mmuso - kgotlapeomolao, bokhuduthamaga le boatlhodi.
xho: siyabakhumbula abo bathi basweleka kubundlobongela obabufumana inkxaso yorhulumente weminyaka yama-1980 nama-1990 kwiilokishi zethu nasezilalini.

tsn: kgololesego le temokerasi gape di dirile gore go nne le baagi ba ba tlhabologileng mme ba le matlhagatlhaga mmogo le bobegakgang jo bo gololesegileng.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo,sihlalo ohloniphekileyo we-ncop,sikwazile ukoyisa intlungu yangaphambili sakhe uluntu olutsha.

tsn: gape kgololesego e tlisitse la ntlha, tsholofelo ya tekatekano ya bong.
xho: sakhe amaziko awomeleleyo wentando yesininzi.

tsn: kemedi ya basadi mo ditheong tsa setšhaba e oketsegile thata fa e sa le go simologa kgololosego, mme le katoloso ya ditirelo tsa motheo e ungwela basadi.
xho: siwungcwabile umbuso ongenalawulo lwentando yesininzi, ongamelanga luntu, wengcinezelo nogcwele lurhwaphilizo owawusebenzela iimfuno zegcuntswana kuphela.

tsn: dintlha tseno tsotlhe di dirile gore aforika borwa e nne lefelo le le botoka go nna mo go lona ga jaana go feta jaaka e kile ya nna.
xho: siqulunqe urhulumente obumbeneyo wamaqela ngamaqela, ongenacalucalulo ngokobuhlanga, nangokwesini wolawulo lwentando yesininzi, obizwa asabele nomele bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.

tsn: fela naga ya rona e sa ntse e lebanwe ke dikgwetlho tse tharo tsa lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatiro, tse re tswelelang go samagana natso.
xho: sidale ulawulo lwentando yesininzi olusekelezelwe kumgaqo-siseko, olunemilenze esebenza ngokubonakalayo yombuso – izindlu zowiso-mithetho, ikhabhinethi neejaji zeenkundla.

tsn: thuto, boitekanelo, ntwa kgatlhanong le bosenyi le bobodu, tlhabololo ya metseselegae le ntšhwafatso ya naga mmogo le go tlhama ditiro tse di seriti.
xho: inkululeko nolawulo lwentando yesininzi lukwadale amathuba oluntu olusebenzayo nenkululeko yamajelo eendaba.

tsn: re tlhamile khomišene ya maano ya bosetšhaba e e tlhagisitseng leano la tlhabololo la bosetšhaba (ndp), letlhomeso la naga la ikonomi ya loago mme gape e le nngwe ya diphitlhelelo tse dikgolo tsa puso ya bone.
xho: ukumelwa kwabantu basetyhini kumaziko karhulumente kwande ngokuncomekayo ukususela oko kwafika inkululeko, kwaye ukunatyiswa kweenkonzo ezingundoqo kukwaxhamlisa abantu basetyhini.

tsn: leano le tlhagisa se re tshwanetseng go se dira go fedisa lehuma, go oketsa ditiro le gore re bo re fokoditse go tlhoka tekatekano ka 2030. tekolo le tshekatsheko ya rona e supa gore ditirelo di le dintsi di tswelela go tokafala.
xho: zonke ezi mpawu zenze umzantsi afrika ube lelona lizwe lingcono onokuhlala kulo kunokuba kwakunjalo.

tsn: sekai, jaanong go tsaya nako e khutshwane go bona madi a tlamelo le makwaloitshupo.
xho: nangona kunjalo, ilizwe lethu lisajongene nomngeni ontlandlo-ntathu wendlala, ukungalingani nentswela-ngqesho, esisaqhubekayo ukusokola ngazo.

tsn: ka go dira mmogo jaaka puso, kgwebo, badiri le lephata la baagi, re tataisa ikonomi gore e itharabologelwe.
xho: sikhethe ukugxila kwimiba ephambili emihlanu, ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo, uphuhliso lwamaphandle nokuhlengahlengiswa komhlaba kwakunye nokudala amathuba emisebenzi endilisekileyo.

tsn: re tsaya dikgato di le mmalwa, go akarediwa molao wa ditshiamelo tsa lekgetho la bothapi le le rotloetsang bathapi go thapa ba bašwa jaaka badiri.
xho: uhlolo novavanyo lwethu lusibonisa ukuba iinkonzo ezininzi ziyaqhubekeka ukuphucuka.

tsn: go tla fetisiwa melawana e e tla netefatsang gore seno ga se ame badiri ba ba sa etleediweng gongwe badiri ba bagolwane bosula.
xho: umzekelo, izibonelelo zenkxaso yezentlalo namaxwebhu ezazisi ngoku athatha ixesha elifutshane ukwenziwa.

tsn: lenaane le le atolositsweng la ditiro tsa setšhaba le lenaane la tiro ya baagi a tswelela go nna tshegetso e e bokgoni ya batlhoki le bašwa.
xho: ngentsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente, abezoshishino, imibutho yezabasebenzi nemibutho emele uluntu, siluthantamisile uqoqosho ukuba lubuyele esiqhelweni.

tsn: re tlhamile ditšhono tsa ditiro di le dimilione di le 3,7 mo dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng.
xho: ubutyebi besizwe jikelele, xa bulinganiswa ngokwemveliso yangaphakathi epheleleyo, bukhule bade bedlula kwi-3,5 seetriliyoni zeerandi.

tsn: kabinete e ipeetse seelo sa ditšhono tsa ditiro di le dimilione di le 6 go tloga monongwaga go ya go 2019, go lebeletswe bašwa.
xho: bali-15 lezigidi abantu abaphangelayo apha kweli lizwe, elona nani liphezulu kwimbali yethu, kwaye kudalwe amathuba emisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-650 000 kulo nyaka uphelileyo, ngokutsho kweziko leenkcukhacha-manani lasemzantsi afrika.

tsn: malapa a le mantsi a ungwelwa go tswa mo dithusong tsa puso tse e leng thuso ya tlamelo ya bana, phenšene gammogo le thuso ya bogole.
xho: sinamanyathelo aliqela esiwathathayo, kuquka nomthetho werhafu yenkuthazo yezengqesho okhuthaza abaqeshi ukuba baqeshe abasebenzi abalulutsha.

tsn: puso e tla tswelela go duela dithuso tseno gonne bontsi jwa magae bo ikaegile ka tsona ka ntlha ya fa ditšhono tsa tiro di se kalo mo nakong eno e e thata ya kwelotlase ya ikonomi.
xho: kuza kuphunyezwa imithetho ukuqinisekisa ukuba oku akubachaphazeli kakubi abasebenzi abangafumani nkxaso yamali okanye abadala.

tsn: ditšhono tseno tse di dirwang ke puso, di re kgontsha gore re bue ka boipelo gore ga jaana re nna mo nageng e e botoka thata fa e bapisiwa le e re neng re nna mo go yona pele ga 1994. bakaulengwe.
xho: amanye amanyathelo aqulathwe kwisivumelwano solutsha sesizwe esatyikitywa esoweto kwekatshazimpunzi yonyaka odlulileyo.

tsn: ditiragalo tsa ikonomi ya amerika di bakile kwelotlase e e bonako mo mading a mebaraka e e sa ntseng e tlhagelela, go akarediwa le ranta.
xho: inkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu enatysiweyo kunye nenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu isaqhubekeka ukuyinciphisa ngokuvakalayo intswela-ngqesho kwabahluphekileyo nolutsha.

tsn: mo tsamaong ya 2013, ranta e wetse tlase ka 17.6% kgatlhanong le dolara ya amerika.
xho: sidale amathuba emisebenzi engaphezulu kwe-3, 7 sezigidi kule minyaka mihlanu idlulieyo.

tsn: seelo se se bokoa sa thefosanyo se matshosetsi a a boitshegang mo infoleišeneng mme gape se tla dira gore lenaane la rona la mafaratlhatlha le nne tlhotlhwagodimo.
xho: abantu bethu bafumana ingeniso nezakhono kwinkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu, abathi bazisebenzise ekufuneni imisebenzi esesikweni.

tsn: le gale, ditlamo tse di romelang ntle, bogolo segolo mo maphateng a tlhagiso, di tshwanetse go dirisa ranta e e bokoa le itharabologelo e kgolo ya lefatshe lotlhe.
xho: ikhabhinethi izimisele umlinganiselo wokudala amathuba emisebenzi ezizigidi ezisithandathu ukususela kulo nyaka ukuya kowama-2019, apho kuza kugxilwa kulutsha.

tsn: re tshwanetse go dira mmogo jaaka puso, kgwebo le badiri go godisa ikomomi ka seelo se se kwa godimo ga 5% gore re kgone go tlhama ditiro tse re di tlhokang.
xho: imizi emininzi iyancedakala ngenxa yezibonelelo zikarhulumente, inkxaso-mali yabantwana, indodla yabadala neyabakhubazekileyo.

tsn: e diragala kwa lekgotla la bosetšhaba la tlhabololo ya ikonomi le ya ditiro, e leng sengwe sa ditheo tsa botlhokwa tsa tirisanommogo mo temokerasing ya rona, magareng ga puso, kgwebo, badiri le baagi.
xho: iimeko zoqoqosho lwasemelika zikhokelele ekuhleni ngamandla kwemali yorwebo lwamazwe asakhulayo, kuquka nerandi.

tsn: palamente e konosetsa dipaakanyo tsa bofelelo tsa molao gore ntlha eno e e siameng e dirisiwe, mme seo se tla fokotsa nako ya go simolola moepo go ya go malatsi a a ka fa tlase ga 300, go tloga ka go dira kopo go fitlha kwa go rebolweng.
xho: izinga lokurwebiselana elibuthathaka liqulathe umngcipheko omkhulu kumandla erandi kwaye kuza kwenza nenkqubo yethu yeziseko ezingundoqo ibize kakhulu.

tsn: motlatsamoporesidente wa rephaboliki o tswelela go gokaganya dipuisano magareng ga puso, ditlamo tsa meepo le badiri.
xho: noxa kunjalo, iinkampani ezithumela imveliso yazo kumazwe angaphesheya, ingakumbi kwicandelo lokuvelisa, kufanele zibusebenzisele ukuzinceda ubuthathaka berandi nokuphucuka koqoqosho ngamandla ehlabathini jikelele.

tsn: maikemisetso ke go tsepamisa dikamano le badiri mo lephateng leno la botlhokwa la ikonomi ya rona.
xho: ngeli xesha sinezinzima, siyayiqonda into yokuba singamelana nalo eli xesha lokungazinzi.

tsn: dikhuduego mo lephateng leno di nnile mmalwa fela mme e bile ga di a tsaya sebaka.
xho: phofu, siza kukulalisa ngophothe ukuba ngaba senza okufanelekileyo.

tsn: re tseregantse mo meepong gonne e le mothapi yo mogolo.
xho: iqhubekekile kwakunye nakuthethathethwano ebesinalo nabezoshishino.

tsn: gape meepo e na le seabe se segolo jaaka moreki wa dithoto le ditirelo, mmogo le motlamedi wa ditshwaelo mo maphateng a mangwe a ikonomi ya rona mmogo le di-ikonomi tse dingwe lefatshe ka bophara.
xho: usekela mongameli werhiphabliki usaqhubekeka ukuququzelela iingxoxo phakathi kukarhulumente, iinkampani zemigodi nemibutho emele abasebenzi.

tsn: re sekaseka tirisanommogo le baamegi go samagana le ntlha ya dintlo kwa ditoropong tse di nang le meepo.
xho: iinjongo zezokuzinzisa ubudlelwane kweli candelo libaluleke kangaka loqoqosho lwethu.

tsn: puso e tswelela go ela tlhoko le go netefatsa kobamelo ya diphitlhelelo tsa maano a ditlamo a loago le badiri mmogo le tšhata ya meepo.
xho: kwaye okona kubaluleke kakhulu, iinkqubo zobudlelwane kwezoshishino ziqhuba ngendlela engqinelanayo nomthetho.

tsn: maaforika borwa ka nna,ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,kwa ntle ga meepo, re supile maphata a mangwe a matlhano a a ka susumetsang ditiro ka 2009. ona ke bojanala, temothuo, ikonomi e e tala, tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha le tlhagiso.
xho: singenelele kwezemigodi kuba ingamanye amacandelo wethu angundoqo ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi.

tsn: indaseteri ya bojanala e godile ka tsela e e gakgamatsang.
xho: sidinga icandelo lezemigodi elisebenzayo.

tsn: ka 1993, aforika borwa e amogetse baeng ba ba tswang kwa ntle ba le dimilione di le tharonyana fela.
xho: imigodi iqesha abantu abangaphezulu kwesiqingatha sesigidi.

tsn: ka 2012, palo eo e ne e godile go fitlha go baeng ba le dimilione di le 13. re tla tswelapele go godisa indaseteri eno, go lebeletswe bokgoni jwa yona jwa go tlhama ditiro.
xho: lilelona lizuza ingeniso enkulu kunaniselwano namazwe angaphandle kwilizwe lethu.

tsn: morago ga moo re ne ra beeletsa r1 tirilione mo mafaratlhatlheng a setšhaba mo tsamaong ya dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng.
xho: ikwa negalelo elimalunga nama-r20 eebhiliyoni eliya ngqo kwingeniso yerhafu.

tsn: tsamaiso ya rea vaya kwa johannesburg ga jaana e dirisiwa ke baagi ba gauteng ba feta 100 000. ditsamaiso tse di tshwanang le tseo di agiwa kwa motsekapa, tshwane, nelson mandela bay, buffalo city, ethekwini le rustenburg.
xho: imigodi yenza igalelo elikhulu kakhulu njengomthengi wezinto ngeenkonzo, kunye nomboneleli wegalelo kwamanye amacandelo oqoqosho lwethu kunye noqoqosho lwamanye amazwe ehlabathini jikelele.

tsn: re agile mola wa peipi ya lookwane wa dikilomitara di le 700 o o tswang kwa durban go leba gauteng go tsamaisa dibilione di le 4 tsa dikhubiki tsa dilitara tsa peterolo, disele le lookwane la difofane ka ngwaga.
xho: sisaqwalasela ubudlelwane bokuhlangabezana nomba wezindlu kwidolophu ezikufutshane nemigodi nabadlala indima ebalulekileyo.

tsn: tswelelopele eno e e amanang le ditsela e re gakolola ka bangwe ba ba dirileng mo pusong eno ba ba neng ba eleletsa naga ya rona tse di gaisang, go tshwana le tona ya maloba ya dipalangwa rre dullar omar.
xho: mandikhumbuze iinkampani zemigodi ukuba unyaka wama-2014 ngowokugqibela wokuba mabaphucule izindlu neemeko abasebenzi-mgodini abaphila phansi kwazo nokuphumeza inani lwezinto ekufanele ziphunyeziwe.

tsn: go simolotswe ka kago ya mela e mentšhwa ya seporo kwa mpumalanga, go fokotsa kgatelelo mo ditseleng.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,malungu ahloniphekileyo,ngaphandle nje kwemigodi, siye sabona amanye amacandelo amahlanu angabadali bamathuba emisebenzi ngowama-2009.

tsn: go tokafatsa tlamelo ya metsi, go konoseditswe matamo a magolo a mantšhwa a le mabedi, de hoop kwa limpopo mmogo le spring grove kwa kwazulu-natal, fa legato la 2 la porojeke ya metsi ya lesotho highlands e tla tlhongwa mo bogautshwaneng.
xho: ngowama-2012 sityhile isicwangciso seziseko ezingundoqo sesizwe, ngokukhokelwa ngumongameli ngekhomishini kamongameli yokulungelelanisa iziseko ezingundoqo.

tsn: go tsweletswe ka kago ya diteišene tse dintšhwa tsa maatla, medupi kwa limpopo, kusile kwa mpumalanga le ingula gaufi le ladysmith, mme tsona di thapa badiri ba feta 30 000. re tswelela go sekaseka metswedi e mengwe ya maatla, go lepalepana le leano le le kopanetsweng la ditlamelo tsa maatla.
xho: emva koko sityale itriliyoni enye yeerandi kwiziseko ezingundoqo zoluntu kule minyaka mihlanu idlulileyo.

tsn: go tlhagisiwa ga peteroliamo, bogolo segolo gase ya šale, go tla fetola selebo sa kgaolo ya karoo mmogo le ikonomi ya aforika borwa.
xho: inkqubo ye-rea vaya yaserhawutini ngoku isetyenziswa ngabahlali basegauteng abangaphezulu kwe-100 000. inkqubo ekwanjalo isakhiwa ekapa, etshwane, enelson mandela bay, kwisixeko sase-buffalo, ethekwini nase-rustenburg.

tsn: morago ga go sekaseka matshosetsi le ditšhono, go tla gololwa melawana ya bofelo fa gautshwane mme yona e tla latelwa ke tsamaiso le thebolo ya dilaesense.
xho: amazibuko needolophu ezinamazibuko zeli lizwe ziphuculiwe.

tsn: re solofetse go konosetsa theko ya dimekawate di le 9 600 tsa maatla a nyutlilia.
xho: sifakele uluhlu lwemibhobho yezibaso engama-700 eekhilomitha ukusuka ethekwini ukuya egauteng yokuthutha iibhiliyoni ezine zeekyubhik-litha zepetula, idizili kunye nezibaso zejeti ngonyaka.

tsn: go setse go tlhophilwe batlhagisi ba biofuel mme ba setse ba simolotse go dira.
xho: sekwakhiwe iindlela ezintsha okanye imizila ephantse yafika kwi-1500 leekhilomitha.

tsn: ditokololo tse di tlotlegangruri naga ya rona ke naga e e dirang mme ke lefelo le go leng botoka go nna mo go lona.
xho: le nkqubela ngokumalunga neendlela isikhumbuzo ngabo babesebenza kulo rhulumente ngaphambi kwethu ababefuna ukuba eli lizwe lifumane okungcono kodwa, abafana nowayesakuba ngumphathiswa wezothutho umnu dullar omar.

tsn: go adilwe mogala wa faeba opotiki wa dikilomitara di le 37 000 ke maphata a poraefete le a setšhaba mo dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng.
xho: i-arhente yabakhweli bakaloliwe yasemzantsi afrika (i-prasa) iza kuchitha ngaphezulu kwe-r120 leebhiliyoni kule minyaka ilishumi izayo ukuthenga oololiwe abatsha.

tsn: go tla konosediwa kago ya thelesekoupu ya ntlha ya dijana di le 64 fa go lebilwe kwa arei ya sekwere kilometara, e leng meerkat, mo kotareng ya ntlha ya 2014. ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,diketleetso tsa rona tsa go susumetsa tlhagiso di nnile le dipoelo.
xho: abakwa-transnet baphumeza isicwangciso-qhinga sabo esifunekayo sama-r300 eebhiliyoni, ngokwakha iziseko ezingundoqo zezothutho ezidingeka ngamandla.

tsn: sekema sa peeletso ya dijanaga se se tlhomilweng ka 2009 se reboletse diketleetso tsa boleng jwa r3.8 bilione go beelediwa mo diporojekeng tsa peeletso di ka nna 160. tsona di tshegetsa ditiro di feta dikete di le 50. ditlamo di tla bo di dira dikoloi, dithekisi mmogo le dibese.
xho: ngokuqonda amandla wezoqoqosho wentshona koloni nonxweme lwasentshona, simisele ummandla wophuhliso lwamashishini i-saldanha saze savula nemizi-mveliso emibini emitsha e-atlantis.

tsn: re tsepamisitse lephata la diaparo, dikhai, letlalo le ditlhako, le le neng le kgaola ditiro.
xho: ukuphucula ubonelelo lwamanzi, sele egqityiwe ukwakhiwa amadama amabini amatsha, i-de hoop elimpopo ne-spring grove kwazulu-natal, ngeli xesha isigaba sesibini seprojekthi ilesotho highlands water iza kumiselwa kungekudala.

tsn: tsona di akaretsa dibese, merogo e e mo metemeng, diaparo, dikhai, letlalo, ditlhako mmogo le dithoto tse dingwe.
xho: ulwakhiwo lwezikhululo zombane ezitsha ezibini lusaqhubekeka, imedupi elimpopo, ikusile empumalanga ne-ingula kufutshane nomnambithi, kwaqeshwa abasebenzi abangaphezulu kwama-30 000. sisaqhubekeka ukuphonononga eminye imithombo yezamandla, ngokuhambelana nesicwangciso semithombo edibeneyo yezamandla.

tsn: maaforika borwa ka nna,re tshwanetse go dira ka natla go tlhabolola batlhagisi ba ba tlhagelelang gongwe ba bantsho.
xho: siyihlolile imingcipheko namathuba, imithetho yokugqibela iza kuqukunjelwa kungekudala ize ilandelwe ngokwenziwa nokukhutshwa kweempepha-mvume.

tsn: bontsi jwa batlhagisi ba ba simololang ba bantsho ba ngongorega ka mathata a ba a itemogelang go bona matlole a tlhagiso, mebaraka ya batlamedi le bareki, mmogo le tshegetso ya setegeniki ya tlhagiso.
xho: silindele ukuqukumbela ukufumaneka kwama-9 600 ee-megawatts zamandla enyukliya.

tsn: letlole la bosetšhaba la maatlafatso, koporasi ya tlhabololo ya indaseteri le setheo sa matlole sa dikgwebopotlana, di tla tswelela go tlamela dikgwebo tse di kgonegang tsa bantsho ka matlole go tsweletsa diindasteri.
xho: abavelisi bezibaso ezivela kwizityalo sele bekhethiwe kwaye sele beqalisile ukusebenza.

tsn: balemirui ba ntlha ba ba potlana ba le 88 ba ba mo lenaaneng leno ba tlametse lenaane la dijo la lefatshe la ditšhabakopano ka ditone di le 268 tsa mmidi le dinawa gore di romelwe kwa lesotho mo kgweding e e fetileng.
xho: kule minyaka mihlanu idlulileyo kufakelwe iintambo zombane ezinezigqubuthelo zeplastiki ezingama-37 000 eekhilomitha.

tsn: re solofetse gore palo eno e oketsege.
xho: oko kuza kwandiswa ngokuvakalayo kule minyaka siya kuyo.

tsn: re tla tsweletsa le lephata la rona la botshwaratlhapi, le le tsenyang madi a a fopholediwang go r6 bilione mo ikonoming mme le tlamela ka ditiro di le 27 000. ditokololo tse di tlotlegang,re nnile le tswelelopele e e bonalang mo lenaaneng la ntšhwafatso ya naga.
xho: siyazingca ngempumelelo yethu kwezenzululwazi nobuchwephetshe.

tsn: fa e sale go tloga ka 1994, dipolase di ka nna 5 000 tsa diheketara di le dimilione di le 4.2, di fetiseditswe kwa bantshong, mme di ungwetse malapa a feta 200 000. ditleleimi tsa mafatshe di ka nna 80 000, tsa boleng jwa diheketara di le dimilione di le 3.4, di setse di konoseditswe mme batho ba le dimilione di le 1.8 ba ungwetswe foo.
xho: ukwakhiwa kwesibonakude sokuqala sama-64 eedish ephambili ye-square kilometre array, i-meerkat, kuza kugqitywa kwikota yokuqala yowama-2014.

tsn: tsamaiso e e latelang e tla tshwanelwa ke go tsweletsa pele dipholesi di le mmalwa, ditsereganyo tsa peomolao le tiragatso go tswelela go samagana le go tseelwa lefatshe ga batho ba rona.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,inkuthazo yethu yokukhulisa imveliso seyineziqhamo ezibonakalayo.

tsn: ke ka moo re itumeletseng gore go na le koketsego e e boitshegang ya kwadiso ya bana kwa sekolong, go tloga ka dithuto tsa pele ga poraemari go ya kwa legatong la dithuto tse dikgolwane.
xho: silizinzisile icandelo lezeempahla, impahla elukiweyo, ufele nelezihlangu, apho abantu babekade bephelelwa yimisebenzi.

tsn: ka ditlhatlhobo tsa ngwaga le ngwaga tsa bosetšhaba, re ela tlhoko ditokafalo le ditsereganyo tse di tlhokegang, bogolo segolo mo dipalong le saense.
xho: oku kuquka iibhasi, iimfuno enkonkxiweyo, impahla, impahla elukiweyo, ufele nezihlangu nezinye iimveliso.

tsn: go tsweletsa go akaretsa le go nna le dipharologano, go tla rutwa kharikhulamo ya puo ya diatla ya aforika borwa kwa dikolong, go tloga mo ngwageng o o tlang wa 2015. re okeditse palo ya rona ya bagolo ba ba kgonang go buisa le go kwala ka lenaane la kha ri gude go tloga go dimilione di le 2,2 ka 2008 go ya go batho ba le dimilione di le 3. gape re beeleditse mo katisong ya barutabana mme re bula gape dikholetšhekatiso tsa barutabana go fitlhelela tlhokego.
xho: sinemizekelo ebonakalayo yokuphumelela kwenkqubo yokuqaqambisa imveliso yasekhaya.

tsn: go tlhagisa tikologo e e nang le seriti ya go ithutela, re agile dikolo tse dintšhwa di le 370, go tsena mo legatong la dikolo tsa mmu mmogo le tsa dikago tse dingwe tse di neng di sa siama go ralala naga.
xho: kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo, kudityaniswe iiteksi zeminibhasi ezingama-20 000 neebhasi ezingama-330 apha ekhaya, oku kutsalela utyalo-mali nophuhliso kwizixeko zethu.

tsn: bakaulengwere ka tlotla kgang e e monate le ka tsa thuto e kgolwane.
xho: uninzi lwabanini mizi-mveliso abamnyama abasakhulayo bakhalazela ubunzima abahlangana nabo ekufumaneni inkxaso yezezimali zoshishini lwemizi-mveliso, urhwebo lwababoneleli nabathengisa ngemiyinge emincinci, nenkxaso yobuchwephetshe bokuvelisa.

tsn: ikwadiso ya baithuti kwa diyunibesithi e oketsegile ka 12% fa ikwadiso ya dikholetšhe tsa thuto le katiso e e tswelelang (fet) e oketsegile ka 90%.
xho: ingxowa-mali yokuxhobisa yesizwe, nequmrhu lophuhliso lwamashishini kunye ne-arhente yenkxaso-mali yamashishini amancinane ziza kuqhubekeka ukubonelela ngemali yenkxaso kumashishini wemizi-mveliso aphilayo wabanini abantsundu ukukhuthaza ukwanda kwamashishini emizi-mveliso.

tsn: re okeditse tekanyetsokabo ya sekema sa thuso ya matlole a baithuti sa bosetšhaba go ya go r9 bilione go fitlhelela tlhokego e e oketsegang.
xho: ukongeza apho, sikhuthaza amashishini azinzileyo ukuba axhase uphuhliso lwamashishini emizi-mveliso yabantsundu.

tsn: phitlhelelo e nngwe e kgolo ya paka eno ke go tlhamiwa ga diyunibesithi tse pedi tse dintšhwa, e leng sol plaatje kwa kapa bokone le yunibesithi ya mpumalanga.
xho: ezolimo ngumdali wamathuba emisebenzi ongundoqo nomboneleli wamathuba ezoshishino.

tsn: re tla aga gape dikholetšhe tse dintšhwa tsa fet kwa limpopo, mpumalanga, kwazulu-natala le kapa botlhaba.
xho: inkqubo yethu yenkxaso yezolimo, i-fetsa tlala, ivelisa abathumeli-mveliso kumazwe angaphesheya abatsha.

tsn: mo dingwageng di le tlhano tse di fetileng, go agilwe ditheo tse dintšhwa tsa boitekanelo di le 300, go akarediwa le ditleleniki tse dintšhwa di le 160. dipetlele tse dintšhwa di le lesome di agilwe kgotsa di ntšhwafadtswe kwa ladybrand, germiston, mamelodi, natalspruit, ethekwini, zola, bojanala, kgaolo ya vryburg, swartruggens, khayelitsha le mitchell’s plain.
xho: ukususela ngowe-1994, phantse ziifama ezingama-5 000, ezenziwa ziihektare, ezidluliselwe kubantu abantsundu, ezixhamlise iintsapho ezingaphezulu kwama-200 000. phantse ibe ngamabango omhlaba angama-80 000, afikelela kwi-3,4 sezigidi zeehektare, asele egqityiwe kwaye kuxhamle i-1,8 sezigidi zabantu.

tsn: mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegangmodulasetilo yo o tlotlegang wa ncoptokafalo mo hiv le aids ke nngwe ya diphitlhelelo tse dikgolo go gaisa tsa tsamaiso eno mme mananeo a ditšhabakopano a aids (unaids) a re dirisa jaaka naga ya sekao.
xho: urhulumente olandelayo kuza kufuneka ukuba uqhubele phambili ngenani elivisayo lemigaqo-nkqubo, ungenelelo lwezomthetho nolubonakalayo, ukuqhubela phambili ukulungisa ukuhluthwa komhlaba kubantu bethu.

tsn: tshwaetso ya hiv go tswa go mme go ya go ngwana e fokotsegile thata mme re okeditse palo ya batho ba ba amogelang kalafi ya dianthiretrobaerale gabedi, go tswa go batho ba le milione o le mongwe go ya go ba le dimilione di le 2.4 ka 2013. maaforika borwa a feta dimilione di le 20 a dirile teko ya hiv fa e sale go tlhomiwa letsholo ka 2011 mme seo ke sesupo sa go ikanya tsamaiso ya boitekanelo.
xho: oku kuquka imiba enxulumene nokusekwa kwe-ofisi yomhlengahlengisi jikelele ngalo ndlela kuvulwe inyoba yokufakwa kwamabango.

tsn: dingwaga tsa go tshela jaanong di tlhatloga ka tsepamo.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyoeneneni umzantsi afrika lilizwe elithe chatha ngobungcono ukuhlala kulo.

tsn: tiro ya go thibela e tshwanetse go tswelela pele ka bonako gore re kgone go fitlhelela phitlhelelo ya gore go se ke ga tlhola go nna le tshwaetso ya hiv.
xho: uyilo lwenkqubo-sikhokelo malunga nokufikelela okupheleleyo ku-greydi r kushicilelwe kwiphepha-ndaba lombuso ukwenzela ukuba uluntu luhlomle, ngeenjongo zokwenza ukuba ukufakwa kwabantwana kugreydi r kube sisinyanzelo.

tsn: ka kakaretso, re tla tsena mo legatong le lentšhwa la tiragatso ya lenaneo la inšorense ya bosetšhaba ya boitekanelo e e tla atolosetsang tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ya boleng kwa bahumaneging.
xho: bantu bakuthi,abantwana abazizigidi ezisibhozo abahlawuli ezikolweni, kanti abazizigidi ezilithoba bafumana ukutya okusempilweni ezikolweni okuphuma kurhulumente, ukuze bafunde kakuhle bangafi yindlala.

tsn: modulasetilo yo o tlotlegang wa ncop,mmusakgotla yo o tlotlegangseelo sa bosenyi ka kakaretso se fokotsegile ka 21% go tloga ka 2002 mme tiro ya go dira gore baagi ba nne ba babalesegile e tswelela pele.
xho: izinga lokuphumelela kwimatriki liyenyuka ukususela malunga nama-61% ngowama-2009 ukuya kuma-78% kulo nyaka uphelileyo kwaye nokuphumelela kwabemfundo yezidanga kuyaphucuka qho ngonyaka.

tsn: nngwe ya dintlha tsa botlhokwa tse di totilweng ke go fedisa tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le basadi le bana.
xho: ngohlolo lonyaka-nonyaka lwesizwe, sihlala sikwazi ukubona ukuphucuka namangenelelo adingekayo, ingakumbi, kwizibalo nenzululwazi.

tsn: tsona di akaretsa go bulwa gape ga diyuniti tsa tirisodikgoka ya mo malapeng, tshireletso ya bana le melato ya thobalano mmogo le dikgotlatshekelo tsa melato ya thobalano.
xho: sikwatyale imali kuqeqesho lweetitshala nokuvulwa kwakhona kweekholeji zootitshala ukukwazi ukuhlangabezana noko kudingekayo.

tsn: re leboga mekgatlho e e seng ya puso e e mentsi e e tsweletsang ditshwanelo tsa basadi le bana tse di tshwaelang mo tirong eno e e botlhokwa.
xho: ukuvelisa indawo yokufundela endilisekileyo, sinikezele ngezikolo ezingama-370 ezitsha ezithatha indawo yezikolo zodaka nezinye izakhiwo ezingafanelekanga elizweni jikelele.

tsn: ditheo tsa rona tsa tiragatso ya molao di dira ka natla go fedisa bosula jono.
xho: bantu bakuthi,kuhle esinokukubalisa nakwimfundo ephakamileyo.

tsn: gape re na le ditumelano le dinaga tsa china, vietnam, kenya, mozambique le tsa dinaga tsa mokgatlho wa tlhabololo ya borwa jwa aforika (sadc) go dira mmogo go fedisa bosenyi jono.
xho: ukubhaliswa kwabafundi kwidyunivesithi kwande nge-12% ngeli xesha ukubhalisa kwiikholeji zokwandisa imfundo noqeqesho (ii-fet) kwande ngama-90%.

tsn: bakaulengwekemonosi ya boatlhodi e tokafaditswe gape ka go tlhamiwa ga kantoro ya moatlhodimogolo jaaka setheo se se ikemetseng go tswa mo lefapheng la bosiamisi le tlhabololo ya molaotheo.
xho: esinye seziphumo ezigundoqo kweli xesha ibe kukusekwa kweedyunivesithi ezimbini ezintsha kraca, i-sol plaatjie emntla koloni kunye nedyunivesithi yasempumalanga.

tsn: re fetisitse melao e le mmalwa go tshegetsa seabe seno se sentšhwa sa kantoro ya moatlhodimogolo.
xho: sizokwakha neekholeji zee-fet ezili-12 elimpopo, empumalanga, kwazulu-natal nasempuma koloni.

tsn: go na le tswelelopele mo go fetoleng boatlhodi gore bo bontshe merafe le bong jo bo farologaneng mo nageng.
xho: bantu bakuthi,ukumiselwa kwenkqubo-sikhokelo yentsebenziswano kwezemfundo yesizwe kulo nyaka uphelileyo ibe linyathelo elibaluleke kakhulu kweli lizwe.

tsn: kgwetlho ke go dira diphetogo mo porofešeneng ya molao ka kakaretso gore go nonotshiwe setlhopha se baatlhodi ba basadi ba ka thapiwang go tswa mo go sona.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyosihlalo ohloniphekileyo we-ncopinguqu kwintsholongwane kagawulayo (i-hiv) nogawulayo (i-aids) yenye yeempumelelo ezinkulu zalo rhulumente kwaye sisetyenziswa njengelizwe elinguvulindlela yinkqubo yoncedo lukagawulayo yezizwe ezimanyeneyo, (i-unaids).

tsn: go konosediwa ga molaotlhomo wa tiragatso ya molao go tla thusa go atolosa setlhopha se batlhankedi ba boatlhodi ba ka tlhophiwang go tswa mo go sona.
xho: usuleleko lwe-hiv phakathi kosana nonina luhle kakhulu kwaye siliphindaphindile inani labantu abafumana unyango lwamachiza okuthomolalisa intsholongwane kagawulayo (ii-arv), ukususela kwisigidi esinye ukuya kwi-2,1 sezigidi zabantu.
